definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

sentences.english: For decanters fitted with a bowl speed inverter, start up must always be done at low speed.
sentences.chinese: 對配有轉鼓變速器的離心機，必須以低速啓動。

sentences.english: Semi Centrifugal dehydration drum to improve the efficiency of dewatering equipment.
sentences.chinese: 半離心轉鼓脫水裝置提高脫水效率。

sentences.english: The series centrifuge drum wall holes without filter, filter, is not required to operate.
sentences.chinese: 該系列離心機轉鼓壁無濾孔，操作時不需濾布。

sentences.english: Some of the strips in the drum controller are electrically interconnected.
sentences.chinese: 轉鼓控制器中的一部分傳感片是相互通電的。

sentences.english: The basket walls of this series have no holes, so no filter cloth is needed.
sentences.chinese: 該系列離心機轉鼓壁無濾孔，操作時不需濾布。
